extendedInfo.description: Can you solve this fun Mix & Match puzzle? Use the "MIX" Button in each scene and see what happens. Great puzzle fun is waiting for you. You solve the puzzle by completing the four animals that fit the shapes at the bottom of the scene. Switch the scene from 2 to 3 pieces puzzles by using the button on the upper right corner. This app offers high-quality illustrations, funny effects and sounds - all just waiting to be discovered Features: - 4 different themes (Africa theme, animal farm and forest life) - Mix & Match option for 2 or 3 pieces puzzles (switch the scene by clicking the button on the upper right corner) - The puzzles are randomized on each play - Cute and kid-friendly graphics and sounds - Pop the ballons game at the end of a successful game One scene (Africa theme) of this Mix and Match puzzle is completely free, the other levels (themes: Animal farm, Africa theme and forest life) can be easily unlocked in-game.When your kids like Mix&Match Puzzles and Shape Matching Games, you should try this!
